name: Tea Ais
description: Tea Ais is Ice Tea with condensed milk. It's name is derived from the pouring of 'pulling' the drink during preparation.
directions: Steep the tea bags covered in the hot water for 5-8 minutes
Mix in the milk and sugar
prepare two containers, preferalby with curved lips to ease pouring with minimal dripping
With a steady stream, pour the tea from one container to the other backand forth
carefully increase the height as your pour
The higher the steam   , the frothier it'll become
